description: Scanning the network to retrieve various information and act on remote stations.
summary:
Dipiscan is a tool that will allow you to analyze the devices connected to your network.
	In addition to the usual information (IP address, MAC address, connected user, etc.) that most other tools of the same kind provide,
	Dipiscan also offers the possibility to configure the retrieval of additional information (extracted from the remote registry or by WMI/SNMP requests).
	This is done very easily via the tool's configuration window.
author: Damien PONNELLE
